item.title: [video] – Trouble with the Twittersphere
item.description: Related articles by Zemanta {.zemanta-related-title} Just found a nice video about twitter and it’s users called the Twittersphere. [youtube PN2HAroA12w] (via blogdrauf.de) Related articles by Zemanta {.zemanta-related-title} Immorality and Twitter (scientificamerican.com) Getting sucked into Twittersphere… (localglobe.blogspot.com)

item.title: SuggestRSS – Great Service to suggest interesting feeds
item.description: SuggestRSS is a service suggesting feeds based on your actual feeds. Just upload a OPML export of your current subscribed feeds and you are going to get nice new suggestions. I tried it out and think it is very useful. (via ReadWriteWeb) Related articles by Zemanta {.zemanta-related-title} SuggestRSS Goodbye, share.opml.org SuggestRSS: Super Simple New Feed Recommendations Feed Your Monster One Way to Speed Up Your Feed Reading Track Hot Topics On Niche Blogs With FeedVis How to: Build a Social Media Cheat Sheet for Any Topic
